Articles.Content:
So a while ago (probably a couple years at least) I was playing this game.

http://www.nasa.gov/offices/education/programs/national/ltp/games/moonbasealpha/index.html

In it, you do a lot of maintenance on parts of the moonbase. It was a little tedious at times, but I think this would be something that could be incorporated into KSP quite nicely, especially with the EVA being added.

EDIT: I should mention that it IS free, the only thing is you have to get it through steam.
The game is still really fun to play, but with the Text to Speech it can kinda get... annoying.
its more AEIOU AEIOU AEIOU AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA JOHN MADDEN than anything else
I attempted to play. Every install I\'ve had for it says it needs to be debugged. I\'ve tried EVERY solution I could find none of them work.

Bummer, works fine for me. I just did a clean install on a computer it\'s never been on. It is a couple years old, I wonder if it\'s a DirectX problem, or a C++ problem as the game uses both. I really have no idea as I\'ve never had a problem with the game, just spitballing.
See this:
This video is sure psychedelic ;P Watch this 20 times a day to go crazy !

Yeah I played this game.

The Developers are the same people who made America\'s Army 1.X, 2.X and 3.X series

I played AA 2.X for many years and a bit of 3.X

There was a great community for a few years.

For a while I became 'famous' on the game for my forum activity.

'Famous' isn\'t my own words, I was actually told on several occasions 'Omg it\'s YOU!'

and I was all 'O.o ?...'

And yeah...fun times...

Moon Base Alpha was pretty fun too, I enjoyed it

Wow, when you talk, you can hear it! wow... i could just amagine it:

Me: Hi! im new!

TROLL: UIAYUIAAUAOIYIAYAI

SPEAKERS: WTF

Wow, when you talk, you can hear it! wow... i could just amagine it:

Me: Hi! im new!

TROLL: UIAYUIAAUAOIYIAYAI

SPEAKERS: WTF

I played it with my youtube group the other day. One dude joined and he was like

Are we fixing the moon?
No, we\'re fixing JOHN MADDEN!
FOOTBALL!
...Damnit
OH NO ITS ANOTHER CHINESE EARTHQUAKE ERBRBRBRBRBRBRBRBRBRBRBRBRBRBRBRBRB
JOHN MADDEN!
JOHN MADDEN!
SCIENCE!
-player has disconnected-

I believe this picture is appropriate.

I\'ve got thousands of these.
I have the sudden tendenacy to get this game and go do some chineese earthquakes

I think Monbase Alpha esque gameplay would fit nicely with KSP.

And that video proves it. Because reasons.

Here\'s the video:

Midnight Shenanigans 4 - Moonbase Alpha
